StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetHighSchools]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
select school_code as SchoolCode, organiza.on_id as Organiza.onId,
highschool_name as HighschoolName, telephone_number as TelephoneNumber, state_code as 'Address/StateCode', street as 'Address/Street', street2 as 'Address/Street2', city as 'Address/City', zip_code as 'Address/ZipCode', dod_code as DODCode, school_type as SchoolType from mcriss.dbo.high_school where deleted = 'N' FOR XML PATH('HighSchool'), ROOT('HighSchools')
